roleset.name: to gain something and/or place in a location (bag)
roleset.note: BAG-V NOTES: Frames file for 'bag' based on sentences in EBC. Verbnet class 9.10; other framed members include bottle, can, file, house, imprison, pocket, shelve, trap. Frame created by Arrick (from bag.01-v)

example.name: financial gain
example.text: In 1997 for example, of the 227 foreign films on release in Taiwan, one third -LRB- 72 films -RRB- were released * by the Taiwan branches of Hollywood companies, yet they bagged a 76 % share of total box office.
example.arg: a 76 % share of total box office

roleset.name: discard or abandon
roleset.note: BAG-V NOTES: Based on twitter disaster data. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from bag.02-v)
